paths: Initial assessment and management of gastrointestinal bleeding -> Pass NG Tube -> Withdraw tube -> Leave tube in place for lavage -> If lower GI bleeding is suspected -> Consider: Elective colonoscopy -> If no diagnosis is made -> Consider: Selective arteriography||Initial assessment and management of gastrointestinal bleeding -> Pass NG Tube -> Withdraw tube -> Leave tube in place for lavage -> If lower GI bleeding is suspected -> Consider: Elective colonoscopy -> If no diagnosis is made -> If bleeding continues -> Consider: Selective arteriography
